channel.title: Re: 'rich or 'java is a bitch' help here
channel.description:
how do u make it auto cast barrage when i put in staff?
and how do u slow down att speed?

item.title: Re: 'rich or 'java is a bitch' help here
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Well I’ll write it out for you (In Words), not code.

First your gonna go to the method Attack(), put the ItemID of the ancient staff, and i suggest you make another method containing all the shit that ice barrage has.

Then just call the method if your wielding that item.

This is from the top of my head though, but that seems like it would work, except for probably the projectile heading to the player and the actual GFX on the player.

Make a for loop?

p.stillgfx(gfxId, p.absX, p.absY);
p.createProjectile(parameters here);

I guess that’s it?

Read full topic
item.source: Re: 'rich or 'java is a bitch' help here

item.title: Re: 'rich or 'java is a bitch' help here
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“kc pure 816, post:4, topic:179680”]no i no u guys no how to code good it just when i ask them they all ways help me and delta u hella of a good coder it just u be bean mean.
and xx qwertyuiop xx i didnt think u new how to code i thought u was more of a client coder tpy proson how about ill ask u 2 next time

[quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=240894.msg2040838#msg2040838 date=1202550574]
Hey, you didn’t include me…
Well, time to go jump out a window.

The answer to your first question is to make an attack for the staff in your attack boolean.
The answer to your second question is to simply lower the timer you made for attacks.

Oh, and I’m too lazy to get up, so I’ll kill myself later.
[/quote]explain a lil more plz and dont kill your self lol[/quote]
Oh, I’m just as good with server programming as I am with client programming.
…ah, fine… I won’t kill myself…

Read full topic
